ModMetaData.name: Star Wars Slave Bikini Outfit
ModMetaData.author: Lumi
ModMetaData.description: A bikini-style costume consisting of a gold brassiere fastened over the neck and behind the back with string, a gold thong g-string panty and red flowing veils attached to the front and back of the panty. Especially popular amongst Jabba's slave girls on Tatooine. updooted by stafftank
